app_monitoring: Here, it can be shown a series of statistics and visualizations regarding the application health, such as the occurrence of exceptions and errors and metrics on latency or throughput.
infra_monitoring: This page could display a monitor for the infrastructure provisioning: metrics about computational and storage resources (consumption and costs), DevOps metrics, application consumption metrics (number of requests or interactions, and so on).
model_monitoring: This page could present a dashboard for model monitoring, involving the evolution of operational (business) metrics, performance (statistical) metrics, opposition of current metrics against expected values (test set metrics).
